item.title: June 2nd, 2022
item.description: shermanrose.uk dev Found an issue with obsidian-export It escapes unsafe HTML characters without a way to disable this. This is causing havoc with trying to use shortcodes. That explains why I have had no luck using the < > code format over the % % format. I’m going to have to do that rewrite I didn’t want to do, as I’m not interested in learning Rust right now. Further Site Dev Work I found this working on the front page of the site.

item.title: July 7th, 2022
item.description: Golang app architecture I have been writing my first go app at work, which now has pain points in its architecture that make it harder to add new features. The issue is that I started an app with CLI features that were useful during testing but didn’t make sense when an HTTP rest API was later added and targeted as the primary use case. Supporting both usages became expensive as testing and new features were burdened by the need to keep functionality consistent across the two APIs.
